tool_description: Validates accommodation search results for data quality, completeness, and business rules compliance.

property_ids.description: List of property IDs to validate

check_availability.description: Whether to verify current availability status

check_pricing.description: Whether to validate price accuracy and currency

check_completeness.description: Whether to check for missing essential data fields

error_messages: Invalid property IDs: Provide 1-500 valid property identifier strings.
Validation service unavailable: Unable to connect to property validation services.
Bulk validation limit exceeded: Too many properties to validate in single request.
usage: Provide property_ids array and set validation flags for availability, pricing, and data completeness checks. Returns validation status and any issues found.

valid_property_ids.description: Property IDs that passed all validation checks

validation_score.description: Overall validation score (0-100) for the result set

recommendations.description: Recommendations for improving search result quality
